mapper.sql: id, order_no, tid, harbour_code, status, user_id, user_name, create_time
mapper.select: select t.id,t.order_no,t.tid,t.harbour_code,t.`status`,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time, t1.code_name tName, t2.code_name harbourName from order_conf t LEFT JOIN transport_way t1 on t1.id = t.tid LEFT JOIN harbour_info t2 on t2.id_code = t.harbour_code WHERE t.id = #{id}

select t.id,t.qie,t.`names`,t.sail_time,t.cut_off_time,t.jc_time,t.jkc_time,t.types,t.`status`,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time, CONCat(t3.start_shipment,'-',t3.destination_port) route from offer_info t JOIN ocean_conf_detail t1 on t1.id_code = t.id and t1.types=1 JOIN order_conf t2 on t2.id = t1.order_id LEFT JOIN quotation_template t3 on t3.id = t.qie where t2.id = #{orderId}

select t.id,t.cntr_no,t.cabinet_code,t.volume,t.cost,t.cid,t.`status`,t.ob_id,t.create_time, t1.order_id,t1.supplier_code,t1.sail_time, t2.supplier_ch_name from ocean_counter t left join ocean_bill t1 on t1.id = t.ob_id left join supplier_info t2 on t2.supplier_code = t1.supplier_code left join ocean_conf_detail t3 on t3.id_code = t1.id and t3.types=2 left JOIN order_conf t4 on t4.id = t3.order_id where t4.id = #{orderId}
